attributes.action: Remove LGBT content from the Relationships Education curriculum
attributes.background: We believe that schools should not be teaching Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender (LGBT) content to children. A lot of parents do not want this being taught and the Government should remove this from the Relationships Education curriculum so that schools are not required to teach it.
